welcome.title: EasySQL Assistant
welcome.subtitle: Ask questions about your data in natural language

chat.placeholder: Ask {{database}} database... (Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line)
chat.placeholderClarification: Enter your answer... (Press Enter to send)
chat.forkConfirmDescription: This will copy this message and earlier context (including chart recommendations) into a new session. Your current chat stays unchanged.
chat.modalTitle: Start a new chat from this message

clarification.inputHint: You can type your answer below, or click a quick option

history.title: Session History
history.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this session?

settings.title: System Settings
settings.pageSubtitle: Manage runtime configs by category, with sync status and system overview.
settings.configEditorTip: Runtime config updates are persisted in DB and take effect immediately for new requests.

query_mode.label: Query Mode
query_mode.description: plan uses multi-step reasoning; fast returns SQL directly.

openai_llm_model.label: OpenAI Primary Model
openai_llm_model.description: Used for SQL generation when OpenAI is selected.

google_llm_model.label: Google Primary Model
google_llm_model.description: When configured, Gemini can be selected with higher priority.

anthropic_llm_model.label: Anthropic Primary Model
anthropic_llm_model.description: When configured, Claude can be selected with higher priority.

model_planning.label: Planning Model
model_planning.description: Used for analyze/clarify stages; falls back to primary model.

temperature.label: Model Temperature
temperature.description: Controls sampling randomness; set to 1 for models that require fixed temperature (e.g., Kimi 2.5).

use_agent_mode.label: Enable Agent Mode
use_agent_mode.description: Uses a ReAct loop to iteratively repair SQL.

agent_max_iterations.label: Agent Max Iterations
agent_max_iterations.description: Upper bound of Agent loop iterations.

max_sql_retries.label: Max SQL Retries
max_sql_retries.description: How many times SQL generation can retry on failure.

openai_api_base.label: OpenAI API Base
openai_api_base.description: Custom API base URL for proxy or compatible gateway.

retrieval_search_top_k.label: Retrieval Top-K
retrieval_search_top_k.description: Maximum number of candidate tables retrieved each request.

retrieval_expand_fk.label: Enable FK Expansion
retrieval_expand_fk.description: Expands related tables through foreign-key links.

retrieval_expand_max_depth.label: FK Expansion Depth
retrieval_expand_max_depth.description: Maximum hop depth for FK graph expansion.

semantic_filter_enabled.label: Enable Semantic Filter
semantic_filter_enabled.description: Filters low-relevance candidates by semantic similarity.

semantic_filter_min_tables.label: Min Tables Kept
semantic_filter_min_tables.description: Minimum number of tables kept after semantic filtering.

bridge_protection_enabled.label: Enable Bridge Protection
bridge_protection_enabled.description: Protects bridge paths from being over-pruned.

bridge_max_hops.label: Bridge Max Hops
bridge_max_hops.description: Maximum hop distance for bridge traversal.

core_tables.label: Core Tables
core_tables.description: Comma-separated table names prioritized in context building.

llm_filter_enabled.label: Enable LLM Re-Filter
llm_filter_enabled.description: Uses an LLM to rerank/filter candidate tables.

llm_filter_max_tables.label: LLM Filter Max Tables
llm_filter_max_tables.description: Maximum number of tables passed into LLM filtering.

llm_filter_model.label: LLM Filter Model
llm_filter_model.description: Model name used for retrieval-stage filtering.

llm_api_key.label: Retrieval LLM API Key
llm_api_key.description: Credential used by retrieval LLM filtering.

llm_api_base.label: Retrieval LLM API Base
llm_api_base.description: API base URL used by retrieval LLM filtering.

few_shot_enabled.label: Enable Few-Shot
few_shot_enabled.description: Retrieves similar examples to improve SQL generation.

few_shot_max_examples.label: Few-Shot Max Examples
few_shot_max_examples.description: Maximum number of examples injected per request.

few_shot_min_similarity.label: Few-Shot Min Similarity
few_shot_min_similarity.description: Examples below this score are filtered out.

few_shot_collection_name.label: Few-Shot Collection Name
few_shot_collection_name.description: Collection name used to store and retrieve examples.

code_context_enabled.label: Enable Code Context
code_context_enabled.description: Retrieves business code snippets as extra context.

code_context_search_top_k.label: Code Context Top-K
code_context_search_top_k.description: Maximum snippets returned by code retrieval.

code_context_score_threshold.label: Code Context Threshold
code_context_score_threshold.description: Only snippets above this relevance score are kept.

code_context_max_snippets.label: Max Code Snippets
code_context_max_snippets.description: Maximum snippets injected into the final prompt.

public_key.label: Langfuse Public Key
public_key.description: Public key used for Langfuse authentication.

secret_key.label: Langfuse Secret Key
secret_key.description: Secret key used for Langfuse authentication.

chart.notSuitable: Data is not suitable for chart visualization
chart.inferFailed: Could not determine suitable chart type
chart.instructionPlaceholder: Example: Use a line chart by month and focus on total revenue trend

typeReason.bar: Bar chart is suitable for category comparison
typeReason.horizontal_bar: Horizontal bar chart is suitable for ranking
typeReason.line: Line chart is suitable for trend changes
typeReason.area: Area chart is suitable for cumulative trends
typeReason.pie: Pie chart is suitable for proportion distribution
typeReason.donut: Donut chart is suitable for proportion distribution
typeReason.scatter: Scatter plot is suitable for correlation analysis
typeReason.metric_card: Metric card is suitable for key indicators
typeReason.grouped_bar: Grouped bar chart is suitable for multi-dimensional comparison
typeReason.stacked_bar: Stacked bar chart is suitable for composition analysis
typeReason.stacked_area: Stacked area chart is suitable for cumulative composition

recommendation.noNumericColumns: No numeric columns found for visualization
recommendation.inferFailed: Could not determine suitable chart type for this data
